main event: A UFO sighting of a moon-shaped object occurred on April 26, 1963, in Virginia.
interesting points: The object was described to be about 10 feet in diameter and had a bright light and metallic surface., The object was stationary and disappeared and reappeared as clouds passed overhead., Three separate witnesses observed the object for about one hour., The object changed colors, turning red when obscured by clouds., Witnesses speculated that the observed phenomenon could be a sun dog.
witness description: Mrs. ______ was interviewed; she appeared emotional rather than objectively critical about her observation.
